tags.name: Relationship Features
tags.description: Conoce el nivel de relación que tienen tus clientes con otros usuarios.

tags.name: Profiling
tags.description: Descubre cómo perfilar a tus clientes con información completa de su comportamiento móvil.

tags.name: Fraud Prevention
tags.description: Describe un ejemplo de web service que se debe disponibilizar para ser notificado de eventos asociados a la prevención de posibles fraudes.

tags.name: Behavior Features
tags.description: Permite conocer el comportamiento de un usuario en base a información de uso y recargas de servicios móviles.

get.description: Represents the relationship between the age of the phone number with the mobile operator.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: Identifier of the user issuing the request. In the case of A2A integrations this is a unique identifier for the originating platform. In case of requests originated in different agents, this field should identify the agent issuing the request

parameters.name: msisdn
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the request from the issuer side. This information is required for audit and reconciliation processes. Accepts a string value with a maximum length of 50 characters

parameters.name: transactionId
parameters.description: Mobile number whose information is requested. Number must be in international format (msisdn), including country code, with no “+” sign in the beginning. Length: 12.

parameters.name: X-Scoring-Key
parameters.description: Authentication token to be shared by Tiaxa to identify the company issuing the request. For integration purposes considerer the use of a unique token.

get.description: The relationship between operator mobile and the phone number consulted is directly indicated: prepaid, postpaid or mixed customer (controlled account plan).

get.description: The sophistication index is a score given according to a user’s tech adoption. It is composed by the range of the user’s device, mobile OS and the usage of apps such as Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, Snapchat, YouTube and Uber, among others.

get.description: The plan category index measures the cost of mobile services per user. It considers the amount paid in the last 60-day period and incorporates values from billing at postpaid subscription to Top Ups at prepaid.

get.description: The objective of this score is to determine the mobile user’s probability of answering voice calls when it comes to reaching strategies.
